content.html: ugh I feel soooooo sick someone who has kept up on the science: I wouldn’t have a negative Covid test after having symptoms if I had Covid, right?

someone who has kept up on the science: I wouldn’t have a negative Covid test after having symptoms if I had Covid, right?

content.html: ok so turns out if you’re vaxxed, it’s much more likely to take days of symptoms for a Covid test to detect infection. unvaxxed, it’ll start appearing on tests about the same time as symptoms appear. all of this is a few days (at least) after exposure twitter.com/michaelmina_la…
